scenario_text.value: Look, Takuma! I see Aoi over there!
Aoi! You okay?!
Ta-Takuma? I’m so glad you’re okay!

If something happened to you I, I just don’t
know what I’d do...!
Isn’t this great, Aoi?!
That’s my line. I’m just glad you’re okay.
Oh yes! Come on, hide with us over here!
Huh? Hide?

What’s wrong? If we stand in this corner, no
one can see us from the entrance.

We’ll be fine here even if the enemy comes.
So hey, c’mere? Pretty please?

But we have to go see how everyone else is
doing, don’t we?

All of them can take care of themselves! Now
come here, already!

(...This is weird. I can’t imagine Aoi not
worrying about the others.)
Takuma... Isn’t Aoi acting weird?
You think so too, Agumon?

Yeah, she’s usually much kinder than this,
isn’t she?

What’re you guys saying?! How rude can you
get?!

Aoi is Aoi! You two are the worst! What
a couple of doubting Thomases!
Let’s go find the others.
Why not?!
I mean, if all of you are together...
How am I supposed to ambush you?
Wha-! Stand back, Takuma!

I thought so... They’re not the real Aoi and
Labramon!
